properties.areaDesc: Michigan City IN to New Buffalo MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 10:25AM EST until February 5 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
* WINDS...North 15 to 25 knots after midnight tonight becoming
20 to 25 knots Tuesday. North wind 10 to 20 knots Tuesday
night with gusts up to 25 knots through midnight.

* WAVES...4 to 7 feet, occasionally to 9 feet after midnight
tonight. Waves 5 to 8 feet, occasionally to 10 feet Tuesday
and Tuesday evening. Waves subsiding to 3 to 5 feet late
Tuesday night.
properties.instruction:
A small craft advisory means that sustained winds or frequent
gusts of 22 to 33 knots are likely...and/or waves greater than
4 feet are expected. Inexperienced mariners...especially those
operating smaller vessels should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY
